attributes.action: Legalise cannabis use and cultivation in the home,licence and regulate Amsterdam style coffeeshops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cannabis has the effect of pacifying users as opposed to alcohol fuelled aggression and violence tackled by police on most UK city and town streets on a weekend.
Coffeeshops could be taxed and licenced and would give an alternative to alcohol hence liberating police time and costs.
There will always be a minority with an opposing personal story/view no matter what the subject matter but they need to be kept in context with  ratios of opponents to current legislation, eg fox hunting.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Legalise cannabis use and cultivation in the home,licence and regulate Amsterdam style coffeeshops."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16824


Prime Minister's Office
